_PAGE_FILTER_ESCAPE_HTML_ARGUMENTS_VALUE: The string containing potentially unsafe HTML
_PAGE_FILTER_ESCAPE_HTML_DESCRIPTION_:
Escapes HTML special characters in a string to prevent XSS attacks.

This function takes a string input and converts special characters (such as <, >, &, etc.) to their corresponding HTML entities (e.g., <, >, &, etc.), making the string safe to render as HTML.
